data.datePickerOpen: If the date picker is open (true or false)
data.datePickerValue: The default date value. If left empty the current date will be used
data.datePickerFormat: You can choose a few different formats to display the date. See all available formats in the datePickerFormatDate() method.
data.datePickerMonth: Numerical value of the current month (0-11)
data.datePickerYear: Numerical value of the current year
data.datePickerDay: Numerical value of the current day
data.datePickerDaysInMonth: Array containing the number of days in the selected month
data.datePickerBlankDaysInMonth: Array containing the number of blank days before the first day of the month
data.datePickerMonthNames: Array containing the names of the months
data.datePickerDays: Array containing the names of the days
data.datePickerDayClicked(day): When a day is clicked on the datepicker set the new date value
data.datePickerIsSelectedDate(day): Check if the day is the selected date
data.datePickerIsToday(day): Check if the day is today
data.datePickerCalculateDays(): Calculate the number of days in the month
data.datePickerFormatDate(date): Format the date to the selected format
